ygData.subject: Re: SG Guild Suggestions
ygData.msgSnippet: err... i dont want the thug robe lah... a couple more levels i can get fbr myself liaoz... n maybe a couple more i wil go kill the oracle for the robe liaoz...
ygData.messageBody:
err... i dont want the thug robe lah... a couple more levels i can get fbr
myself liaoz... n maybe a couple more i wil go kill the oracle for the robe
liaoz... give the thug robe to nalfien... think he needs it most...

Nic
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, August 20, 1999 10:16 AM
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] SG Guild Suggestions


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Try msging Nica, Kel, Zan or Kal, I think they may be interested.
>
> On Thursday, 19 August, 1999 7:24 PM, Tommy Fong
[SMTP:tommyfong@...] wrote:
> > From: "Tommy Fong" <tommyfong@...>
> >
> > The problem is I can't find any taker to pass the Thug..... ;)
> >
> > On Thu, 19 Aug 1999 11:05:35 +0800, LKW wrote:
> >
> > >If any kakis found an artifact which he dun bother to sell or none of
his
> > >chars can use it, he can pass to another kakis who can use it. Say
Garren
> > >found a Thug robe which he or his other chars can't use, and he dun
bother
> > >to sell. In the end he gave to Ziltus. Later when Ziltus got a Goss
robe,
> > >he is NOT supposed to sell the Thug robe for his own benefit. Instead,
he
> > >pass it to FF. Now FF got a FBR, he will then pass the Thug robe to
the
> > >next kakis who can use it. This way we can practice kakis heritage
system
> > >which will benefit more kakis.
> >
> >
> > Good Hunting,
> >
> > FlyingFox Everest, Level 29 Magician
